abstract: South Korean police and United States military officials say US Army Apache helicopter crashed during training mission in central South Korea, killing two pilots.
lead_paragraph: Two pilots were killed when an Apache helicopter went down in central South Korea during a training mission on Monday.

headline.main: South Korea: 2 Die in U.S. Army Crash
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: 2 Die in U.S. Army Crash

snippet: Two pilots were killed when an Apache helicopter went down in central South Korea during a training mission on Monday.
